newsitem.title: USA: Tennis- Sampras thrashes Philippoussis in U.S. Open
newsitem.headline: Tennis- Sampras thrashes Philippoussis in U.S. Open

text.p: World number one Pete Sampras humbled Australia's Mark Philippoussis 6-3 6-3 6-4 in the fourth round of the U.S. Open on Tuesday.
Philippoussis struggled from the outset, serving six double faults in his first two service games as his expected challenge to the American world number one failed to materialise.
Sampras, who lost to Philippoussis in the Australian Open in January, moves into the quarter-finals.
The American was rarely tested by the Melbourne teenager, who had been Australia's last remaining singles hope at Flushing Meadow.
